## DataPrepareHandlerFunc.(constructor)

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Creates an instance of DataPrepareHandlerFunc.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(dataPrepareFunc: AuthDataPrepareFunc);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dataPrepareFunc | [AuthDataPrepareFunc](./polygonid-js-sdk.authdatapreparefunc.md) | function that produces marshaled inputs for auth circuits |
